value:
$WmMPID_花婿ラフィエル,ch11_17_Raphael_M_Wedding20,Face|*sigh*$k$p$WmMPID_花嫁ニケ,ch11_09_Nike_F_Wedding20,Face|Is that any face to show your bride,
Rafiel... What troubles you so?$k$p$WmMPID_花婿ラフィエル,ch11_17_Raphael_M_Wedding20,Face|Ah, forgive me. It's just that Leanne...$k$p$WmMPID_花嫁ニケ,ch11_09_Nike_F_Wedding20,Face|...Ah, I see. Her, marriage... The idea
of being separated again must be a
painful one.$k$p$WmMPID_比翼ミカヤ,ch11_01_Micaiah_FM_Pair,Face|Well, cheer up, Rafiel! I'm sure the
very idea of marriage is still far from
her mind.$k$p$WmMPID_花嫁ニケ,ch11_09_Nike_F_Wedding20,Face|Girls like her, at her age...she can't
help but want to wear a pretty outfit.
Don't read into it.$k$p$WmMPID_花婿ラフィエル,ch11_17_Raphael_M_Wedding20,Face|I hope you're right...$k$p

$SbpBGM_EVENT_PLAIN_03,0|$WmMPID_花嫁ニケ,ch11_09_Nike_F_Wedding20,Face|All right, that's enough. Your moping
has earned us a defeat now.$k$p...I might almost be justified placing
blame on Leanne, would you say?$k$p$WmMPID_花婿ラフィエル,ch11_17_Raphael_M_Wedding20,Face|No! Please. None of this is her fault.$k$pIt was just...I couldn't keep my eyes
off the beautiful bride! It was my
fault, but...I couldn't look away.$k$p$WmMPID_花嫁ニケ,ch11_09_Nike_F_Wedding20,Face|Hm, well then. I can't very well
hold that against you.$k$p$Sbs150|
